description:
Despite forming an alliance, Lall warns Goro to remain wary of Akitsu and Honoka. But Goro trusts his good friend Akitsu, in particular, and even when he steals his smartphone, Goro writes it off as just a prank. But when he finds him at their arcade...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: お前って, 最高の友達だ
